casebody.data:
BALD HEAD ASSO.
v.
CURNIN. No. 270P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 19, 2006. Stuart L. Egerton, for Bald Head Association.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of May 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of May 2006."
